alert.note: Alert for Cleveland (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 04 at 8:10PM CDT until October 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Central into east central Oklahoma, including areas near and south of Shawnee and Seminole. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 808 PM CDT, Although the heavy rain has ended, flooding of poorly drained and low-lying areas will continue into the late evening hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Southeastern Oklahoma City, eastern Norman, Shawnee, Seminole, Tecumseh, Holdenville, Wewoka, Pink, Konawa, Wetumka, Maud, Earlsboro, Bowlegs, Asher, Tribbey, Wanette, Cromwell, Byars, St. Louis and Lamar. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
